title: game not loading
body: Says garena not available in my region right not. Says service status for all is up and good though. Whats going on? Trying to play this game after not playing it in a while. someone please help.

replies.body: The Garena servers run off a completely different client since they are a little separate from the normal servers. If you want to play there, you'll need to create an account specifically on those servers.
